    • Method Detail

      • isLeapYear

        public boolean isLeapYear()
        This returns boolean if the year is leap
        Returns:
        true if the year is leap and false if year isn't leap

      • getLengthOfMonth

        public int getLengthOfMonth()
        This returns int with the length of the month
        Returns:
        31 if this month equals to 1 or 3 or 5 or 7 or 8 or 10 or 12. Else 30 if this month equals to 4, 6, 9, 11. Else 29 if this month equals to 2 and is leap year equals true. Else 28

      • goToNextDay

        public void goToNextDay()
        This add plus one more day and makes changes for month and year
